Welcome to our website. Arran Online and its associates provide their services to you subject to the following conditions. If you use this website or our companion App, you accept these conditions. Please read them carefully.

1. Application of Terms and Conditions

These terms and conditions apply to all persons and/or entities who have created a user account (“you”) on the website www.arranonline.com (“site”) as operated by Peroosh Ltd. (“we” or “us”). By creating a user account, advertising on our site or by submitting a business listing to be published on our site, you agree to the following terms and conditions and that these prevail over any other terms and conditions.

These terms and conditions should be read in conjunction with our Privacy Policy which can be found on our site.

Any content posted or submitted by you to our site is subject at all times to the Acceptable Use Policy and these terms and conditions.

2. User Accounts and Paid Additional Services

In order to list your business you must create a user account. Creation of a user account and creation of listings is free of charge. You must keep your password for our app and website safe and secure and operate your user account in accordance with these terms and conditions.

With our Paid Additional Services, you optionally may choose to feature your free listing, list an event within your listing or place an advert on our app and website.

If you do not wish to be listed on our site and wish to terminate your user account of listing(s) please email info@arranonline.com and we will remove your listing as soon as is practicable.

The Paid Additional Services provide registered users with the services described on our site in return for the fees set out on our site. Such services may change from time to time. You may upgrade to a Featured Listing or advertise an event by paying the relevant fee in accordance with section 4 (Fees and Payment) below.

We may at our absolute discretion refuse a user account or any type of listing package to any person or entity and we shall not be obliged to state our reasons for such refusal.

Free listings provide the following services:

A listing of your company includes, but it not restricted to, your business name, address, contact details (including website URL and email address), region of Arran, business cover image/logo, opening hours, galleries and social media links (you are permitted to list as many business listings as you wish within your User Account for any one company); and

Inclusion in the simple searches performed by users of our site.

3. Term of User Accounts and Listing Packages

User accounts and listings shall continue unless they are terminated by either party in accordance with section 6 (Termination) below.

Paid Additional Services shall commence from the date on which full payment is received by us and shall continue for the period depicted by the Paid Listing agreement. Upon the expiry of such said period, unless we have received notice from you by email to info@arranonline.com of your clear wish to terminate your Paid Listing, your Paid Listing shall automatically and without further notice renew for a further period as depicted by the agreement taken and your Stripe account shall be debited for the relevant payment.

Either party may terminate a Paid Listing in accordance with the provisions of section 6 (Termination) below.

4. Fees and Payment

The fees additional services described in section 8 (Paid Additional Services) below shall be as set out on our site at the time that you make payment for the Paid Additional Services. These fees may change from time to time.

All fees are exclusive of UK Value Added Tax or any applicable sales tax in any jurisdiction unless specified otherwise on our site. Fees are also exclusive of all taxes, duties and levies of any kind (including withholding tax) which for the avoidance of doubt, you shall be liable to pay.

Payment for all fees is to be made through Stripe.

All fees are quoted in pounds sterling and currency exchange settlements will be as provided by Stripe and your financial institution.

5. Cancellation

You may within 7 days of completing payment for our Paid Additional Services, cancel your Paid Additional Services. To cancel your Paid Additional Services, you must email info@arranonline.com within the aforementioned time period providing clear notice of your wish to cancel your Paid Additional Services.

If we receive notice of cancellation of your Paid Additional Services in accordance with paragraph 5.1, we will refund the Paid Additional Services fee you paid back to your Stripe account within 30 days of our receipt of such notice — subtracting any costs already incurrred for your use of the Paid Additional Service (part days will be counted as whole days).

6. Termination

You may terminate your User Account or Paid Additional Services in accordance with paragraph 2.4 above and we may terminate your User Account or Paid Additional Services at any time without notice to you by removing your listing from our site.

You may terminate any Paid Additional Services for listing at any time by emailing info@arranonline.com and providing us with clear notice of your wish to terminate your Paid Additional Services. Subject to paragraph 5 above, no refund of any fee will be provided on termination. Such termination of your Paid Additional Services shall be effective from the date on which we remove your Paid Additional Services from the site.

If you provide notice to terminate your Paid Additional Services, you shall continue to have a User Account and a Free Listing on our site and these terms and conditions shall continue to apply to your User Account and Free Listing.

We may terminate your user account, Paid Additional Services and the agreement between us without notice and without any liability to make any refund or other payment to you in the following circumstances:

You have breached these terms and conditions, the Acceptable Use Policy or the Privacy Policy in any way;

You are in our opinion transmitting or otherwise connected with any ‘spam’ or any other form of unsolicited bulk email or communication;

Your user account or listing may in our reasonable opinion adversely affect our goodwill or reputation; or

You or us cease to carry on business, are declared bankrupt or enter into an insolvency or administration procedure.

7. Consequences of Termination

Upon termination of the agreement between us, your right to use the registered user sections of our site shall immediately cease. We have no obligation to maintain any of your posted content, Additional Services, Articles or any content within your listing.

Any termination of the agreement between us shall not affect any rights or liabilities that have accrued to us prior to such termination.

Paid Additional Services are limited in number and will be accepted on a first come first served basis. We accept no liability for Paid Additional Services not being available.

If you do not provide the specified materials in the manner and form specified within the time period stated, we shall not be obliged to fulfil the delivery of such Paid Additional Services and no refund shall be made in relation to your payment for such Additional Services.

We may reject at our absolute discretion any materials submitted in relation to Paid Additional Services and may request you to provide amended or additional materials.

If you decide to withdraw your advertisement for any reason, we shall not be obliged to provide you with a refund.

We do not guarantee or make any representation or warranty as to the outcome (such as response levels to advertisements) of your purchase of any Paid Additional Services.

All advertising content is subject to our approval and we reserve the right to reject or cancel any advertisement that we deem to be unsuitable for any reason.
